mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where product_id=#{product_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and status='N'
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_id, product_id, amount, status) values(#{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{amount}, #{status})
mapper.update: update cart set amount=(amount+#{amount}) where product_id=#{product_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and status='N'
mapper.select: select p.name product_name, p.price, p.picture, c.id, c.amount, p.quantity from product p, cart c where p.id = c.product_id and c.member_id=#{member_id} and status='N'
mapper.update: update cart set amount=#{amount} where id=#{id} and status='N'
mapper.delete: delete from cart where id=#{id} and status='N'
